ja477:5.1: paṭisevittho → patisevittho (bj, pts-vp-pli1); paṭisevittha (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja477:5.3: Paṅke ca mā visīdittho → paṅko ca mā visiyittho (mr)
ja477:7.4: sādu → madhu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | khuddarasūpamo → … rasūpamā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja477:14.1: kirāṭañca → kirāsañca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); kirāsaṃ vā (pts-vp-pli1)
